=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PUEEN Nail Art Soft Squishy Silicone Luxury Crystal Stamper and Scraper Set - Stamping Tools - Silver - BH000678
Review Date: 2016/02/01
Store: PUEEN
Product Description: ['This Luxury Crystal Soft Silicon Stamping Tool Set transfers the design from the Image Plate onto your nail with no mess and no fuss. The scraper is used to ensures that just the right amount of polish is left on the design plate to achieve the best result. Each Set Includes: 1 x Crystal Stamper handle 2 x Stamper Head (in 2 different colors) 2 x Scraper Card (in 2 different colors) Stamper Type: Soft Silicon Stamper Head Size: 28mm Handle Finish: Stainless Steel in Silver Stamper Head Color: Pink & Off White']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.97 x 2.36 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Silver', 'UPC': '852664494219 794168040649', 'Manufacturer': 'PUEEN'}
Review Text: I have three different stampers from three different manufacturers.  This one is my new favorite!  It works flawlessly.  It is heavy and sturdy, which allows for excellent precision when applying your stamps to your nail.  My stamps come out perfectly, every time.  No priming necessary!  It works right out the box.  Plus, it came with an extra stamp head and an extra scraper.  BUY IT, you won't be disappointed!!!
Review Title: GET IT!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The analysis of the purchase history reveals a strong inclination towards nail art products, specifically stamping tools and organization solutions. Positive sentiments frequently accompany products that emphasize efficiency and ease of use, as seen in the five-star review for an organizer that eliminates time waste. Conversely, dissatisfaction emerges from items perceived as ineffective, particularly those with quality issues like shallow etching, leading to frustration and lower ratings. 

Themes indicate a preference for products that enhance the nail art application experience, favoring those that are well-built and deliver reliable performance. Quality is a significant concern, with a stark contrast between highly-rated and poorly-rated items based on functionality and effectiveness. 

Price sensitivity is also notable; products that underperform for their price are met with negative reviews. Conversely, satisfactory products receive accolades, reinforcing the expectation of value for money spent. 

In summary, this individual prioritizes functionality, quality, and organization in nail art products, showing a clear trend toward seeking reliable, efficient solutions while expressing strong dissatisfaction with items that fail to meet expectations.

features: Luxury Crystal Soft Silicone Stamper and Scraper Set
Each set includes 2 stamper heads and 2 scrapers
Enjoy the fun and creativity of do it yourself nail art stamping
These stamper heads do not need any priming
A set of Stamping Tools to start your home made beauty
description: This Luxury Crystal Soft Silicon Stamping Tool Set transfers the design from the Image Plate onto your nail with no mess and no fuss. The scraper is used to ensures that just the right amount of polish is left on the design plate to achieve the best result. Each Set Includes: 1 x Crystal Stamper handle 2 x Stamper Head (in 2 different colors) 2 x Scraper Card (in 2 different colors) Stamper Type: Soft Silicon Stamper Head Size: 28mm Handle Finish: Stainless Steel in Silver Stamper Head Color: Pink & Off White
